sn55.2:1.1: “Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato ariyasavako sotapanno hoti avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano.
sn55.2:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako buddhe aveccappasadena samannagato hoti:
sn55.2:2.3: ‘itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava’ti.
sn55.2:2.6: ariyakantehi silehi samannagato hoti akhandehi …pe… samadhisamvattanikehi.
sn55.2:2.7: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato ariyasavako sotapanno hoti avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano”ti.
sn55.2:3.2: Idam vatvana sugato athaparam etadavoca sattha:
